=New Bugtracker=
We've switched to a new [http://apoklipse.org:8080/secure/Dashboard.jspa JIRA Bugtracker]. Please post your bugs and issues there.

==What about the old issues?==
We will still work on fixing the old issues, but new issues will be deleted.

Click [http://code.google.com/p/wowmodelviewer/issues/list here] to view the old issues.
